word_mean: 〔NA〕 〔复strata〕层：厚薄几乎一致的薄片状物，尤指几个相关层次中之一层

sentence.Network_en: It was an enormous task that affected every stratum of society.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是一项影响到社会各阶层的重大工作。

sentence.Network_en: An aquifer is a water - bearing rock stratum such as sandstone and chalk.
sentence.Network_cn: 地下蓄水层是一些有水的岩石层,如沙岩和白垩岩.

sentence.Network_en: Such inequalities are found in every stratum.
sentence.Network_cn: 这类不公平的现象存在于社会的每一个阶层.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in the sense 'layer or coat of a substance'): modern Latin, from Latin, literally something spread or laid down', neuter past participle of sternere 'strew'

entry.def: A stratum of society is a group of people in it who are similar in their education, income, or social status.

example.ex: It was an enormous task that affected every stratum of society...
example.tran: 这是一项影响到社会各阶层的重大工作。

example.ex: The rebels came overwhelmingly from the poorest strata of rural society.
example.tran: 叛乱分子绝大多数来自农村的最贫困阶层。

entry.def: Strata are different layers of rock.

example.ex: Contained within the rock strata is evidence that the region was intensely dry 15,000 years ago.
example.tran: 岩层中有证据表明，该地区在 15,000 年前曾经非常干旱。

means.word_mean: 1. one of several parallel layers of material arranged one on top of another (such as a layer of tissue or cells in an organism)
2. an abstract place usually conceived as having depth;

sentences.sentence: "a good actor communicates on several levels"
"a simile has at least two layers of meaning"
"the mind functions on many strata simultaneously"

auth_sentence.content: So you have fully formed land animals in wrong evolutionary stratum.
auth_sentence.res_content: So you have fully formed land animals in wrong evolutionary stratum.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So you have fully formed land animals in wrong evolutionary stratum.

auth_sentence.content: You might comb a rock stratum for weeks and not find a single fossil.
auth_sentence.res_content: You might comb a rock stratum for weeks and not find a single fossil.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You might comb a rock stratum for weeks and not find a single fossil.

auth_sentence.content: An archaeologist finds a stratum of earth and stones and mortar, mixed with potsherds and coins.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: An archaeologist finds a stratum of earth and stones and mortar, mixed with potsherds and coins.

stems_affixes.word_buile: sub下面+strat扩散,引申为'层次'+al……的→下面一层→基础的
stratum[[n.[地] 地层, [生]组织的层, 社会阶层]]母词鷑.地层,层

stems_affixes.value_cn: [地] 地层, [生]组织的层, 社会阶层
stems_affixes.word_buile: strat扩散,引申为'层次'+um→n.[地] 地层, [生]组织的层, 社会阶层
sub下面+strat扩散,引申为'层次'+e→n.底层,下层,[地]底土层
pro前+strat扩散,引申为'层次'+e→前后同一个层次上→俯卧
strat扩散,引申为'层次'+ify化→v.[使]层化

sentences.en: An aquifer is a water-bearing rock stratum such as sandstone and chalk.
sentences.cn: 地下蓄水层是一些有水的岩石层, 如沙岩和白垩岩。

sentences.en: Such inequalities are found in every stratum.
sentences.cn: 这类不公平的现象存在于社会的每一个阶层。
